name: Building Permit - HVAC Residential
description: City/county building permit required for HVAC equipment replacement or installation
instructions: Contact your local building department to obtain permit. Provide equipment specifications and contractor license number.

name: Mechanical Permit - HVAC Residential
description: Mechanical permit for HVAC work (separate from building permit in some jurisdictions)
instructions: Apply for mechanical permit through city/county. May require load calculation and equipment specs.

name: HOA Approval - HVAC Residential
description: Homeowners Association approval for exterior HVAC equipment placement
instructions: Submit equipment specs and placement diagram to HOA for approval. Allow 30-45 days for review.

name: EPA 608 Certification - HVAC
description: EPA Section 608 refrigerant handling certification (technician must provide)
instructions: Contractor must provide copy of EPA 608 Universal certification for refrigerant work.

name: General Liability Certificate - HVAC Residential
instructions: Request Certificate of Insurance from contractor naming you as additional insured.

name: Workers Compensation Certificate - HVAC Residential
instructions: Request Workers Comp certificate if contractor has employees.

name: HVAC Residential Contract
description: Signed contract defining scope of work and payment terms
instructions: Review and sign contract. Ensure warranty terms and payment schedule are clear.

name: Load Calculation - Manual J
description: ACCA Manual J load calculation for proper HVAC sizing
instructions: Request Manual J calculation from contractor to verify equipment is properly sized for your home.

name: Equipment Specifications - HVAC Residential
description: Manufacturer equipment specs (model number SEER efficiency tonnage)
instructions: Request equipment specs sheet showing model number SEER rating and tonnage.

name: Final Inspection Report - HVAC Residential
description: City/county final inspection sign-off on permit
instructions: Schedule final inspection with building department. Contractor must be present.

name: Warranty Documentation - HVAC Residential
instructions: Register equipment warranty with manufacturer. Keep contractor warranty documentation.

name: Plumbing Permit - Residential
description: Plumbing permit for water heater repiping or fixture installations
instructions: Apply for plumbing permit through city/county. Required for water heater replacement repiping.

name: Gas Permit - Residential
description: Gas permit for gas water heaters or gas line extensions
instructions: Required for gas-fired water heaters or new gas lines. Contact city/county for application.

name: Plumbing License - Residential
instructions: Request copy of contractor's master plumber license.

name: Backflow Certification - Plumbing
instructions: If backflow preventer required request contractor's backflow certification.

name: Plumbing Contract - Residential
instructions: Review and sign contract. Ensure scope payment terms and warranty are clear.

name: Water Heater Specifications - Residential
description: Water heater specs (tankless vs tank GPM BTU)
instructions: Request water heater specs showing capacity recovery rate and efficiency.

name: Backflow Test Report - Plumbing
instructions: Schedule annual backflow test with certified tester. Submit report to water utility.

name: Plumbing Final Inspection - Residential
instructions: Schedule final inspection after work complete. Contractor must be present.

name: Electrical Permit - Residential
description: Electrical permit for panel upgrades circuits or EV chargers
instructions: Apply for electrical permit. Required for panel upgrades new circuits EV chargers.

name: Utility Interconnect Agreement - Solar Residential
description: Utility interconnection agreement for grid-tied solar systems
instructions: Submit interconnection application to utility. Allow 30-60 days for approval.

name: Electrical Contractor License - Residential
instructions: Request copy of contractor's master electrician license.

name: Electrical Contract - Residential
instructions: Review and sign contract. Verify scope payment and warranty terms.

name: Load Calculation - NEC Article 220
description: Electrical panel load calculation per NEC Article 220
instructions: Request load calculation to verify panel capacity for new loads.

name: Single-Line Diagram - Electrical Residential
instructions: Request single-line diagram showing electrical system layout.

name: Electrical Final Inspection - Residential
instructions: Schedule final inspection. Contractor must be present for sign-off.

name: Solar PPA - Residential
description: Solar Power Purchase Agreement (customer buys power not equipment)
instructions: Review PPA terms. Understand $/kWh rate escalator and contract length.

name: Solar Lease - Residential
instructions: Review lease terms. Understand monthly payment and contract length.

name: Solar Cash Purchase Agreement - Residential
description: Solar cash purchase contract (customer owns system)
instructions: Review purchase agreement. Verify system size pricing and warranty terms.

name: Net Metering Agreement - Solar Residential
description: Utility net metering agreement for solar credits
instructions: Submit net metering application to utility with interconnection agreement.

name: ITC Documentation - Solar Residential
instructions: Claim 30% ITC on tax return. Keep all invoices and receipts for IRS.

name: SREC Enrollment - Solar Residential
instructions: Enroll in SREC program to sell renewable energy credits. State-specific.

name: Structural Engineering Letter - Solar Residential
description: Structural engineering letter confirming roof can support solar load
instructions: Engineer must certify roof structure can support solar equipment and snow/wind loads.

name: Shading Analysis - Solar Residential
description: Solar shading analysis and production estimate
instructions: Request shading analysis (PVWatts Helioscope) showing annual production estimate.

name: Solar Commissioning - Residential
description: Utility permission to operate (PTO) after commissioning
instructions: After final inspection utility must grant permission to operate. Required to turn on system.

name: Roofing Permit - Residential
instructions: Apply for building permit for roof replacement. Required in most jurisdictions.

name: Roofing License - Residential
instructions: Request copy of contractor's roofing license.

name: Roofing Contract - Residential
instructions: Review contract. Verify materials payment terms and warranty.

name: Insurance Claim Documentation - Roofing
description: Insurance claim documentation for storm damage
instructions: If insurance claim provide adjuster report claim number and approved amount.

name: Roof Inspection Report - Residential
instructions: Contractor must document pre-existing roof condition before work begins.

name: Material Specifications - Roofing Residential
instructions: Request material specs. Verify shingle type (architectural vs 3-tab) and warranty.

name: Roofing Final Inspection - Residential
instructions: Schedule final inspection after work complete.

name: Manufacturer Warranty - Roofing Residential
instructions: Register roof warranty with manufacturer. Keep documentation.

name: Building Permit - HVAC Commercial
description: Commercial building permit for HVAC equipment
instructions: Submit permit application with equipment specs and plans. Allow 2-4 weeks.

name: Fire Marshal Approval - HVAC Commercial
description: Fire marshal approval for rooftop equipment and gas connections
instructions: Submit plans to fire marshal for review. Required for rooftop units and gas.

name: General Liability Certificate - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Request COI with $2M/$4M limits naming building owner as additional insured.

name: Performance Bond - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Contractor must provide performance bond for projects over $50K.

name: Workers Compensation Certificate - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Request Workers Comp certificate showing coverage for all employees.

name: ASHRAE 62.1 Compliance - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Verify HVAC design complies with ASHRAE 62.1 ventilation standards.

name: Title 24 Compliance - HVAC Commercial (CA)
instructions: Submit Title 24 compliance forms (CF-1R MecH) to building department.

name: Commercial HVAC Contract
description: AIA A101 or custom commercial HVAC contract
instructions: Review contract. Verify scope payment milestones and liquidated damages clause.

name: Load Calculation - Manual N
description: ACCA Manual N commercial HVAC load calculation
instructions: Request Manual N load calculation for commercial HVAC sizing.

name: Equipment Specifications - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Request equipment specs (tonnage EER economizer controls).

name: Sequence of Operations - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Request sequence of operations for BAS integration (Johnson Controls Tridium Siemens).

name: Commissioning Plan - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Commissioning agent must provide commissioning plan per ASHRAE Guideline 0.

name: TAB Report - HVAC Commercial
instructions: TAB contractor must provide certified TAB report per AABC or NEBB standards.

name: Commissioning Report - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Commissioning agent must provide final commissioning report.

name: O&M Manual - HVAC Commercial
instructions: Contractor must provide O&M manual with equipment maintenance procedures.

name: Building Permit - Solar Commercial
description: Commercial building permit for solar installation
instructions: Submit structural plans and electrical single-line for permit review.

name: Utility Interconnect Agreement - Solar Commercial
description: Utility interconnection agreement for commercial solar
instructions: Submit interconnection application. For systems >100kW require interconnection study.

name: Environmental Review - Solar Commercial
instructions: Large solar projects may require CEQA review. Consult with planning department.

name: Solar PPA - Commercial
instructions: Review PPA terms. Understand $/kWh rate credit structure and 15-25 year term.

name: PACE Financing Agreement - Solar Commercial
description: C-PACE financing agreement (Property Assessed Clean Energy)
instructions: C-PACE allows property tax-based financing. Review terms with attorney.

name: ITC Documentation - Solar Commercial
instructions: Claim 30% ITC. Consult tax advisor for proper documentation.

name: MACRS Depreciation - Solar Commercial
instructions: Solar qualifies for 5-year accelerated depreciation. Consult tax advisor.

name: Interconnection Study - Solar Commercial
instructions: Utility must perform System Impact Study for large solar systems.

name: Energy Storage Design - Solar Commercial
instructions: If adding battery storage request design specs and UL 9540A fire testing.

name: Solar Commissioning - Commercial
instructions: After final inspection utility must grant PTO before system can operate.

name: Production Verification - Solar Commercial
instructions: For performance-based contracts third-party verifies system meets production targets.

name: Performance Guarantee - Solar Commercial
instructions: Review production guarantee terms. Understand liquidated damages for underperformance.

name: EPC Contract - Solar Utility-Scale
instructions: Review EPC contract (lump-sum vs cost-plus). Verify payment milestones and liquidated damages.

name: Power Purchase Agreement - Solar Utility
description: 15-25 year PPA with utility or corporate buyer
instructions: PPA defines $/MWh pricing and off-take terms. Critical for project financing.

name: Large Generator Interconnect Agreement
instructions: LGIA required for utility-scale projects. Defines interconnection costs and timeline.

name: Land Lease Agreement - Solar Utility
instructions: Ground lease for solar farm. Verify rent escalation terms and restoration requirements.

name: Tax Equity Agreement - Solar Utility
instructions: Tax equity partner monetizes ITC. Complex partnership structure requires legal counsel.
